meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical>, Master <radical>Splinter</radical> (the rat from Ninja Turtles) isn't even supposed to exist. He exists because someone <kanji>accidentally</kanji> poured ooze on him.
readingMnemonic: But really, if you do something <kanji>accidentally</kanji>, it's probably a <reading>goo</reading>d (ぐう) thing in a way. You learn a bit about how you can improve yourself so you don't do it again, or in Splinter's case, it's just a good mistake!
